welcome.title: IP Address / Hostname
welcome.text: Please insert the IP address or the Hostname of your Alfa by Sinapsi device.

error.ipWrong: Error: invalid IP address or Hostname
error.ipEmpty: Error: the field cannot be empty

error.generic: Error: if the error persists try reconnecting the device
error.ipWrong: Error: invalid IP address or Hostname. Change them from the Settings
error.ipEmpty: Error: the field cannot be empty. Insert it from the Settings
